column4: handbrake (available via a ppa) has a great gui for doing transcoding of video.

Is this the instructions I want to follow? https://launchpad.net/~handbrake-ubuntu/+archive/ppa? The ending of the instructions gets confusing. Where is it placed in classic menu once it is installed?
Yes, those are the instructions.  It is in the media menu after installed.
there is no media menu, sound and video?
